name: numas.wasm
description: numas multiplatform numerical library as WebAssembly module

scripts.build: rm -rf ./output && node index.js && cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && cp ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/numas_wasm.wasm ./numas.wasm

author: Lukáš Zahradník <lukaszahradnik96@seznam.cz>
